DOC.brief_title: Dyslipidemia Study Investigating The Increase In `` Good Cholesterol ''
DOC.detailed_description: A multi-center , three-staged , randomize , parallel group , sequential , double-blind , fenofibrate-and placebo-controlled dose-response evaluation safety , tolerability , effect plasma HDLc TG eight week treatment 1µg 20µg daily dos GW590735 otherwise healthy subject low HDLc , mildly moderately elevated TG , normal LDLc
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Highdensity lipoprotein cholesterol le equal 45 mg/dL . Triglycerides great equal 120 mg/dL less equal 500 mg/dL . Women must surgically sterile postmenopausal . Exclusion criterion : Heart disease Diabetes
